td.content: s:60 YO m circuit preacher presents with 18 months history of moderate urinary hesitancy. he has a history of smoking he denies drinking alcohol o:Height 66 in, Weight 132 lbs, Temperature 98.1 F, Pulse 64, SystolicBP 107, DiastolicBP 65, Respiration 14, HbA1c HbA1c=9 %, Neuro = CN 2-12 intact, motor: 5/5 strength throughout, DTRs: 2+ throughout, sensation = decreased pinprick sensation B/L lower extremity, appears in NAD, age-appropriate speech, Eyes = OD: 20/150, OS:20/100, normal pupillary reflex a:Type 2 Diabetes p:administered glimepiride - 4 mg daily, performed HbA1c, and performed E/M Emergency Services Level 3 - Completed.

Term.SYMPTOM: Delay when starting to pass urine
